description: This file provides helper functions for displaying toast notifications related to API success, error, and info messages. It includes functions to show standardized success, info, and error toasts, parse error objects into human-readable messages, and a utility to trim lengthy message details.

methods.name: showApiSuccess(addToast, message, opts = {})
methods.description: Displays a success toast message with optional details and deduplication key.

methods.name: showApiInfo(addToast, message, opts = {})
methods.description: Displays an info toast message with deduplication support.

methods.name: showApiError(addToast, error, fallbackMessage = 'Request failed', opts = {})
methods.description: Displays an error toast message, parsing the error object for a concise message, with deduplication support.

methods.name: parseError(err)
methods.description: Converts an error object or value into a human-readable string message.

ctags.name: showApiError
ctags.pattern: /^export function showApiError(addToast, error, fallbackMessage = 'Request failed', opts = {}) {$/
